name: Wooden Dummy Drills
description: Train precise strikes, deflections, and footwork using the Wing Chun wooden dummy.

cards.title: Basic Dan Gee Drill
cards.description: A fundamental drill for practicing proper hand positioning and deflection angles.
bulletpoints: Strike with controlled force, not brute power
Keep elbows down to maintain Wing Chun structure
Flow from one technique to the next smoothly

cards.title: Lop Sao & Gan Sao Sequence
cards.description: A sequence using pulling and deflecting techniques to control the opponent.
bulletpoints: Use the Lop Sao (grabbing hand) to redirect attacks
Follow up with Gan Sao (low sweeping deflection)
Maintain strong root and balance throughout
